verses.arabic: يُسَبِّحُ لِلَّهِ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ٱلْمَلِكِ ٱلْقُدُّوسِ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلْحَكِيمِ
verses.english: Whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth is exalting Allah, the Sovereign, the Pure, the Exalted in Might, the Wise.
verses.hausa: Abin da yake a cikin sammai da abin da yake a cikin kasã sunã tasbĩhi ga Allah, Mamallaki, Mai tsarki' Mabuwãyi, Mai hikima.

verses.arabic: هُوَ ٱلَّذِى بَعَثَ فِى ٱلْأُمِّيِّـۧنَ رَسُولًا مِّنْهُمْ يَتْلُوا۟ عَلَيْهِمْ ءَايَـٰتِهِۦ وَيُزَكِّيهِمْ وَيُعَلِّمُهُمُ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ وَٱلْحِكْمَةَ وَإِن كَانُوا۟ مِن قَبْلُ لَفِى ضَلَـٰلٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.english: It is He who has sent among the unlettered a Messenger from themselves reciting to them His verses and purifying them and teaching them the Book and wisdom - although they were before in clear error -
verses.hausa: Shĩ ne wanda Ya aika, a cikin mabiya al'ãdu, wani Manzo daga gare su yanã karanta ãyõyinSa a kansu, kuma yanã tsarkake su, kuma yanã sanar da su littafin da hikimarsa kõ da yake sun kasance daga gabãninsa lalle sunã a cikin ɓata bayyanãnna.

verses.arabic: وَءَاخَرِينَ مِنْهُمْ لَمَّا يَلْحَقُوا۟ بِهِمْ ۚ وَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْحَكِيمُ
verses.english: And [to] others of them who have not yet joined them. And He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise.
verses.hausa: Da waɗansu mutãne daga gare su, ba su i da riskuwa da sũ ba, alhãli kuwa shĩ ne Mabuwãyi, Mai hikima.

verses.arabic: ذَٰلِكَ فَضْلُ ٱللَّهِ يُؤْتِيهِ مَن يَشَآءُ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ ذُو ٱلْفَضْلِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ
verses.english: That is the bounty of Allah, which He gives to whom He wills, and Allah is the possessor of great bounty.
verses.hausa: Waccan wata falalar Allah ce Yanã bãyar da ita ga wanda Yake so. Kuma Allah ne Ma'abũcin dukan falala mai girma.

verses.arabic: مَثَلُ ٱلَّذِينَ حُمِّلُوا۟ ٱلتَّوْرَىٰةَ ثُمَّ لَمْ يَحْمِلُوهَا كَمَثَلِ ٱلْحِمَارِ يَحْمِلُ أَسْفَارًۢا ۚ بِئْسَ مَثَلُ ٱلْقَوْمِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ لَا يَهْدِى ٱلْقَوْمَ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
verses.english: The example of those who were entrusted with the Torah and then did not take it on is like that of a donkey who carries volumes [of books]. Wretched is the example of the people who deny the signs of Allah. And Allah does not guide the wrongdoing people.
verses.hausa: Misãlin waɗanda aka ɗõra wa ɗaukar Attaura sa'an nan ba su ɗauke ta ba, kamar misãlin jãki ne Yanã ɗaukar littattafai. Tir da misãlin mutãnen nan da suka ƙaryatã game da ãyõyin Allah! Kuma Allah bã Yã shiryar da mutãnẽ azzãlumai.

verses.arabic: قُلْ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ هَادُوٓا۟ إِن زَعَمْتُمْ أَنَّكُمْ أَوْلِيَآءُ لِلَّهِ مِن دُونِ ٱلنَّاسِ فَتَمَنَّوُا۟ ٱلْمَوْتَ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ
verses.english: Say, "O you who are Jews, if you claim that you are allies of Allah, excluding the [other] people, then wish for death, if you should be truthful."
verses.hausa: Ka ce: "Yã kũ waɗandasuka tũba (Yahũdu)! Idan kun riya cẽwa kũ ne zãɓaɓɓun Allah bã sauran mutanẽ ba, sai ku yi gũrin mutuwa idan kun kasance mãsu gaskiya."

verses.arabic: وَلَا يَتَمَنَّوْنَهُۥٓ أَبَدًۢا بِمَا قَدَّمَتْ أَيْدِيهِمْ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌۢ بِٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
verses.english: But they will not wish for it, ever, because of what their hands have put forth. And Allah is Knowing of the wrongdoers.
verses.hausa: Kuma bã zã su yi gũrinta ba har abadã sabõda abin da hannãyen su suka gabãtar. Kuma Allah ne masani ga azzãlumai

verses.arabic: قُلْ إِنَّ ٱلْمَوْتَ ٱلَّذِى تَفِرُّونَ مِنْهُ فَإِنَّهُۥ مُلَـٰقِيكُمْ ۖ ثُمَّ تُرَدُّونَ إِلَىٰ عَـٰلِمِ ٱلْغَيْبِ وَٱلشَّهَـٰدَةِ فَيُنَبِّئُكُم بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.english: Say, "Indeed, the death from which you flee - indeed, it will meet you. Then you will be returned to the Knower of the unseen and the witnessed, and He will inform you about what you used to do."
verses.hausa: Ka ce "Lalle mutuwar nan da kuke gudũ daga gareta, to, lalle ita mai haɗuwa da ku ce sa'an nan kuma anã mayar da kũ zuwa ga masanin fake da bayyane, dõmin Ya bãku lãbãri game da abin da kuka kasance kunã aikatãwa."

verses.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ إِذَا نُودِىَ لِلصَّلَوٰةِ مِن يَوْمِ ٱلْجُمُعَةِ فَٱسْعَوْا۟ إِلَىٰ ذِكْرِ ٱللَّهِ وَذَرُوا۟ ٱلْبَيْعَ ۚ ذَٰلِكُمْ خَيْرٌ لَّكُمْ إِن كُنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.english: O you who have believed, when [the adhan] is called for the prayer on the day of Jumu'ah [Friday], then proceed to the remembrance of Allah and leave trade. That is better for you, if you only knew.
verses.hausa: Yã kũ waɗanda suka yi ĩmãni! Idan anyi kirã zuwã ga salla a rãnar Jumu'a, sai ku yi aiki zuwa ga ambaton Allah, kuma ku bar ciniki. Wancan ɗinku ne mafi alhẽri a gare ku idan kun kasance kunã sani.

verses.arabic: فَإِذَا قُضِيَتِ ٱلصَّلَوٰةُ فَٱنتَشِرُوا۟ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَٱبْتَغُوا۟ مِن فَضْلِ ٱللَّهِ وَٱذْكُرُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ كَثِيرًا لَّعَلَّكُمْ تُفْلِحُونَ
verses.english: And when the prayer has been concluded, disperse within the land and seek from the bounty of Allah, and remember Allah often that you may succeed.
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan idan an ƙarẽ salla, Sai ku wãtsu a cikin ƙasã kuma ku nẽma daga falalar Allah, kuma ku ambaci sũnan Allah da yawa ɗammãninku, ku sãmi babban rabo.

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا رَأَوْا۟ تِجَـٰرَةً أَوْ لَهْوًا ٱنفَضُّوٓا۟ إِلَيْهَا وَتَرَكُوكَ قَآئِمًا ۚ قُلْ مَا عِندَ ٱللَّهِ خَيْرٌ مِّنَ ٱللَّهْوِ وَمِنَ ٱلتِّجَـٰرَةِ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ خَيْرُ ٱلرَّٰزِقِينَ
verses.english: But when they saw a transaction or a diversion, [O Muhammad], they rushed to it and left you standing. Say, "What is with Allah is better than diversion and than a transaction, and Allah is the best of providers."
verses.hausa: Kuma idan suka ga wani fatauci kõ kuma wani wasan shagala, sai su yi rũgũguwar fita zuwa gare su, kuma su bar ka kanã tsaye. Ka ce: "Abin da yake a wurin Allah ne mafi alhẽri daga fataucin, alhãli kuwa Allah ne Mafi alhẽrinmãsu arzũtãwa."
